Object.Description: A noob friendly weapon for those who suck at fighting games.
The legendary weapon of the black horseman, Death, and is filled with the power to tear down the walls of reality. This weapon was not meant for the hands of mortals.
This pitch-dark armor made from skins of the lost and tormented. It contains a power that seems to scare even the gods of our lands.

It is unsure if this is the origin? But it exudes such a darkness that it is irrelevant to those who would wear it. Twisted faces of lost souls can be seen swirling in its material, and can strike from darkness itself.
A gruesome ring adorned with the bones of fallen warriors. It grants the wielder an ungodly power, but at a terrible price, one that destroys the very soul.
Sword of Light, once wielded by the Archangel Michael, was forged for war with the Devil and his demons. Now you must carry on his work.
Armor worn by the army of angels, crafted to increases the abilities of any who wears it. Lightweight and maneuverable, while providing the maximum defense possible.
Helm of the Guardian. Created by the Gods for a great war with the creatures of the abyss.
A ring forged from holy light, created to defend against the minions of the dark and strike them down.
A sword steeped in a darkness so pure, that not even the most despicable of creatures would touch it, raising the question of who would dare to forge such an awful weapon.
A black plate forged in the deepest reaches of the abyss, created solely to sew destruction and chaos. It wields such a fearsome power that only the most twisted of beings dare to don this armor.
An ancient helm made from a dark and evil magic...Power comes at a price.

A shield that seems to avoid the direct gaze of any who looks upon it, almost as if it wishes to hide its true, and terrible form. It is so powerful, that it will cause even the most hardened warrior to stagger and fall under its mighty defense.

This ring has been used to control the beasts of shadows since time immemorial. Although it appears to be a simple ring, it exudes enormous power, and seems to carry a will of its own, a will that would see the destruction of all things.
One of the few axe weapons, and built solely for the destruction of one's foes. It gives no quarter, and will cut down any who dare to oppose it.
Captain Frickin' America Baby!
Captain America Armor
The primary defensive and offensive piece of equipment used by Captain America
Dude! it's Captain America Ring!
At least, we think it's a dagger. Its hard to see.
A beautiful gem cut from an invisible stone. Be careful not to lose it
Where'd you go?
One ring to bring them all, and in the darkness hide them.
The object of torture...is torture.
The wearer of this robe shall suffer endless torment
Down, down, down
Imbues the wearer with a very particular set of skills
A weapon of untold killing power. Many gods lie in its wake
An insignia worn by those adept in the art of killing
A ring made from the bones of fallen warriors.
Depicted in Norse mythology as one of the most fearsome weapons, capable of leveling mountains.
A wand empowered by the flames of the Phoenix
Enchanted with evil, bound in sorcery, and curse are those who use it.
Enchanted ring of the Phoenix
A true Unholy Dagger, used for many sacrifices to the Dark Lords of the Realm.
A staff which feels forever cold to the touch, it has a dark presence that can not be denied.
A dark brotherhood, a dark past, and an even darker secret, poisons, potions, spells, and this is only what you see...
A dagger left behind from a great massacre in Bedlam Asylum.
Slowly but surely his bow will drain their life away just as he did
When the unholy army rose, shields gave them dark, almighty strength and power
Tricky situations called for tricky maneuvers when the Unholy battle begun, untrained enemy were quickly put to death.
An Unholy Brotherhood, Satanic rituals, sacrifice...
Hordes of Unholy archers came in the thousands, destroying all from a distance with poisoned arrows
A seal that summons power from the undead
Undead soldiers, summoned to fight the great battle, would wear impenetrable helms..
Short swords used by undead soldiers, were high in numbers, and were often thrown, impaling enemies all across the battlefield
Skilled and deadly rogue thiefs, would be sent to infiltrate enemy headquarters and recover information on planned attacks, these unholy cloaks served well in these times.
It was Boshy Time
You sometimes wish it wouldn't come back.
Pizza Sword!!!.... Ummm.. hmm.
A ring made from the yummiest Pizza in town.
Pizza Armor, made of Pizza :D err.
Pizza Helm.
Janus the Doorwaden gave gifts to who could defeat him. This bow has got lucky ones.
Stange eye staring at me from the inside...
Why is this sparkling eye still alive ? Thanks to petrovlolo to made this set
When Janus threw their keys -one different from the other, and lay motionless and quietly called me...
A powerful energy is enclosed within.
This skull proved to be a great conversationalist.
A heavy armor, yet light as a feather.
This thing looks unstable. Better be careful, it might explode. Thx to BLOODQWEN, to draw this set.
Everything you need to humiliate the monsters.
Only one person had this, then they got eaten by a dragon.
This helmet sits perfectly on your head, and can only be used as a leader.
I think its still beating, better not eat it now. Thx to BLOODQWEN, to draw this set.
Thx to Frunza and Sottler to made this Skin/Set
No corporeal creature can kill my sorrow.
I feel my flesh again! For the first time in a thousand years I LIVE!
Just you? I guess you don't have any friends to play with but don't worry we can still be miserable together.
The King's wife died here. For her memory. Thx to Jinx, to draw this set.
This staff is dusty... It may contain an ancient power...
In this dress when it fought a brave monk. But the forces of darkness poglatili his soul.
Old ring. It was passed from hand to hand many generations. Thx to BLOODQWEN, to draw this set.
A dagger that seems just a tad bit... off
That cloak looks awful familiar... How'd it get here? Am I imagining things?
Sure, you're fine now but...
Every time you look directly at it, you hear the sound of chains. Thx to Sottler to draw this set.
Venimus ut vinceret...
Nos ad delendam...
GOTTA GO FAST!!!
This wand has been conserved in a great ancient temple, preventing whoever who destroys the Earth, punishing those who dare.
Crafted from the shells of the Hermit God and its minions, oddly enough it makes a good quiver. Thx to OppaLoopa
This weapon was crafted in the forges of the heavenly castle.
The eye of Heaven beholds all sins, tremble to the might of the heavenly crystal!
The crystal riveted to the belt adorns the robe.
The power of the crystal will light the way for all to live under eternal harmony. Thx to BLOODQWEN
O' Sha sha sha 'laylee.
I caught him, but he slipped out of his clothes, unfortunately revealing his bare bottom.
He dashed off in the nude, absentmindedly leaving his hat behind. Thx to Cloudedshadow97
They're after me lucky charms!
This stone ring looks safe to handle, but something tells me to be careful about it...
What lava is splashing, we don't know. How it knows it's splashing, we also don't know.
Warm on the inside, strong on the outside. With such protection, who would fear even Satan?
A fire-breathing sword filled with destructive energy. Even the dragons envy its might.
This skull used to be used in the worshiping of the Cube god, but, since we are killing all of them they won't need it, right? Thanks to SyndicateXx for Idea/Sprite.
Extremely sharp and incredibly hot. With such a little thing, you have to be careful.
It's so bright and shimmering. I'd better keep a watchful eye on it, just in case some one wants to steal it.

Object.id: Armor from the Bowels of Hell
Object.Description: Armor from hell, it kinda of instills fear in you, but at the same time it makes you desire a Barbeque!
Object.DisplayId: Armor from the Bowels of Hell

Object.Description: A luxurious ring made with a magnificent stone. The owner looks even more luxurious.
Well, you can't seem to find the tear anywhere. But, I bet it is somewhere.
When you put it on, it freezes you. You feel like you will never be warm again.
This knife has a built in sharp edge , so it doesn't need to shoot one out
If the old men of the swamp are to be believed, this small jar of toad bile promotes good health.
Wearing this armor has the added benefit of giving warts to enemies that touch you.
Obtaining this ring reminded you of your youth, back when you still did biology in school.
This heavy log has been made out of an Ent Ancients corpse. Hunted down by the Stone-born berserkers of Leernoth, used for absolute obliteration of their enemies in combat.

The hollowed out trunk of an Elder Ent Ancient, destroyed by a Archmage of the Southern Golgari Guild in the mountains of Trasdon. It was used to fuel their necrotic quest for dominance across the swamps of the Greenland.
The heart of an old Ent Ancient, which provided the forests of Zendikar with life and magic, blossoming all the plants anew.

A small shield used by the Woodland Rangers of the Aether. It provided them with the speed and agility necessary to win the titanic war against the Berserkers of Leernoth for peace towards the Faeries in Mount Hallow.
Theres a fire, not really a storm but it sounds cooler.
A mechanical type of bow? A gun!?
The Kid had an adventurous soul, but trying to fly with the cape was a doomed adventure to begin with.
A legendary blade wielded by Megaman's arch rival Zero , it crackles with energy as you swing it.
A magical staff of ancient origin.
A legendary weapon, used by the archdemon Malphas in his long forgotten raids against the realm.
Decrepit wands used by undead mages, used to summon eldritch terrors from the far corners of hell to lay waste to all that stood in their way Thanks to Pringle/Turtlebat.

A legendary katana made of blue steel said to be found in the deepest trenches of the ocean. Its attacks can create tremendous waves of water out of thin air that devastates even the most hardy of enemies.
A hammer forged by the gods; one swing is able to banish any evil it encounters.
Said to have been the treasure of an ancient cloud civilization, its icy tip seals in the souls of the fallen.
A rousing spiritual, Arr. MrSott.
The cloth feels wet to the touch, not at all like a pillow.
A glance at this mysterious artifact sends shivers down your spine, but it's oddly warm.
{equip.An_amulet_that_provides_helpful_benefits_at_the_cost_of_rai}
Devoted's Doom Shield
Devoted's Crimson Sword.
Hubbler's Predator Bow
